message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in both our interests.
I'm proposing a more equitable split this time, Alice. Let's make a deal!
Bob, time is running out!  This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, let's be realistic.  I'm offering you a good deal considering the inflation. We both lose if this drags on.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the money shrinks even further!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to settle this before we both lose out.
